new:
After clearing The Trial of the Stone Monument, you can obtain the "Divine Protection of Heroic Spirits" and temporarily enhance the abilities of your player character. 

The enhancements include various stat boosts and resistance increases, and you can freely choose one from the options presented. 

※This enhancement is only valid within the Epitaph Road and will reset upon moving to a different area.
